author: Former Rep. Loretta Sanchez (D-Calif.), opinion contributor
description: President Trump's conflicting approach to China has led to Republican legislation to prevent the Trump administration from liberalizing regulations that limit China's access to advanced computer chips, which could have devastating consequences for U.S. AI supremacy.
title: Trump administration’s disjointed approach to China is a national security vulnerability

author: Steff Danielle Thomas
description: Former White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany on Friday warned against making early endorsements in the 2028 presidential race, pushing the GOP to seek a competitive primary instead. “I think it’s very important that the Republican party have a competitive primary,” McEnany, who served at the end of President Trump’s first term, told Fox New’s…
title: Kayleigh McEnany urges GOP to seek competitive primary in 2028: ‘It makes you tougher’

author: John Mac Ghlionn, opinion contributor
description: President Trump's approval rating has plummeted due to rising prices, wages not keeping up, and his increasingly erratic behavior, leading to a grim Christmas season for American families.
title: How President Trump ruined Christmas

author: Amie Parnes
description: While California Gov. Gavin Newsom has stolen much of the attention in Democratic conversations about the next presidential race, another governor is quietly garnering some buzz among strategists and top Democratic donors: Andy Beshear. The Kentucky governor has been able to win elections in a fiercely red state as a measured, moderate Democrat. He’s not…
title: Andy Beshear builds buzz among Democrats for possible White House run

author: Douglas MacKinnon, opinion contributor
description: There is a sea change taking place in our nation, and the waters are getting much more turbulent for the GOP.
title: Who — and what — Republicans fear the most heading into 2026 and 2028

author: Steff Danielle Thomas
description: Brett Smiley, the Democratic mayor of Providence, R.I., is asking the FBI to issue a reward to the anonymous Reddit user whose tip led to the suspect in last week’s Brown University shooting. The FBI offered a reward of up to $50,000 for any information leading to the identification, arrest and conviction of the individual responsible…
title: Providence mayor: ‘Hero’ tipster that led officials to Brown shooting suspect should get full $50K

author: Bhupinder Kaur, opinion contributor
description: Federal leadership cannot remain silent while misinformation shapes national policy.
title: Immigrants didn’t cause America’s trucking crisis — Washington did

author: Ryan Mancini
description: President Trump on Friday told supporters that Democrats will shut down the government over health care in January, after Affordable Health Care (ACA) tax credits are set to expire going into the new year. “The problem is that Democrats will shut down the government because they are beholden … to the insurance companies,” Trump said…
title: Trump at NC rally: Democrats ‘will shut down government’ in January
